J = VL_IMDOWN(I) downsamples the image I by half by discarding each other pixel.

VL_IMDOWN() accepts the following options:

Method Sample

'Sample' downsamples the image by discarding pixels. 'Average' instead averages groups of 2x2 pixels.

See also: VL_IMUP(), VL_HELP().
